name: Magicanna ~ Ruins
description:
Explore old ruins by solving puzzles with three young witches, Iryna, Sorinne, and Rimia, searching for a magical crystal!

As part of their class assignment, their class was split into teams to go out and find a crystal, which gives witches more power. While trying to find it, Iryna, Sorinne, and Rimia stumble upon ancient ruins near a crystal site. Help them solve various puzzles to find the crystal!

Jam entry for Ludum Dare #36, a 72-hour game jam. The theme was "Ancient Technology".
